channel.title: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server
channel.description: can u explain what file to add the code to and where at??

item.title: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.source: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server

item.title: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server
item.dc:creator: @fantom fantom
item.description:
@fantom wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:5, topic:334494”]Ok, one second. I’ll edit this post and tell you how

EDIT:

Search this in your client.java

private void customCommand(String command) {

Under that add this:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Save, compile. You’re good.[/quote]
tyvm!! i would give u rep++ if i could lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server

item.title: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Add under private void customCommand

if (command.startsWith("giveints")) { sM("X Coord: " + absX + " Y Coord: " + absY + " Height" +heightLevel+"."); }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

I can tell you where to put it… Open up your client.java and search for a commonly used command like

pickup

Than above it add you coding… you may want to add it next to a teleport command though…
GL

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add the ::giveints command to my server
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Ok, one second. I’ll edit this post and tell you how

EDIT:

Search this in your client.java

private void customCommand(String command) {

Under that add this:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Save, compile. You’re good.
